title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom setup and teacher
thoughts: This classroom feels very structured with all the flags and uniforms. I should pay close attention to the rules and make sure I follow them properly to fit in.
memory: Noticed classroom has American and California flags

action: Maintains attentive posture while subtly observing teacher's movements
thoughts: The teacher seems about to begin the lesson. I should maintain proper form and be ready to follow instructions. Everyone else is being so still and proper - I need to make sure I fit in and follow the rules correctly.

action: Maintains attentive posture while subtly checking neighbor's uniform compliance
thoughts: The teacher seems to be evaluating us silently. I should make sure everyone is following the uniform rules properly - that's how we maintain good standing in this experiment. Social acceptance comes from perfect compliance.
memory: Noticed all students maintaining proper posture

action: Maintains attentive posture while subtly scanning the room for any uniform violations
thoughts: The teacher is still evaluating us silently. I need to make sure everyone maintains proper uniform standards - any violations could affect our group's score. My own uniform feels correct and I'm maintaining proper posture.
memory: All students maintaining proper uniform compliance
Continuing to monitor for any rule violations
Maintaining proper personal appearance and posture
